import React from "react"; const DisplayPosts = ({id,test,data,del}) => { console.log(test) const filteredPosts=data.filter((post)=>post.id===id) const {title,category,text}=filteredPosts return

ID: {a.id}

Title: {a.title}

Category: {a.category}

Text:{a.text}

}; export default DisplayPosts;
